Control Name: INFORMATION SYSTEM BACKUP | TESTING FOR RELIABILITY / INTEGRITY
Control Statement: The organization tests backup information [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] to verify media reliability and information integrity. Supplemental Guidance:  Related control: CP-4.
